code:
---
config:
  theme: neo
  layout: dagre
---
stateDiagram
  direction LR
  classDef draftC fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
  classDef publicC fill:#bbf8c0,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
  classDef unlistedC fill:#f9f7ae,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
  classDef privateC fill:#ddd6f3,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
  classDef withdrawnC fill:#fcbbbb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px;
  [HealthTech_EMR_Sync] --> draft
  draft --> public:Publish
  draft --> unlisted:Link only
  public --> unlisted:Unlist
  unlisted --> public:List
  public --> private:Hide(HealthTech_PatientRecords)
  unlisted --> private:Hide(HealthTech_PatientRecords)
  private --> public:Re-publish
  private --> withdrawn:Withdraw
  public --> withdrawn:Withdraw
  unlisted --> withdrawn:Withdraw
  withdrawn --> public:Restore(HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
  withdrawn --> [HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
  draft:Draft
  public:Public
  unlisted:Unlisted
  private:Private
  withdrawn:Withdrawn
  note right of draft : Drafts are only visible to editors.
  note right of public : Public posts are listed and discoverable.
  note right of unlisted : Unlisted posts are shared by URL only.
  note right of private : Private posts are hidden from everyone.
  note right of withdrawn : Withdrawn posts are removed from public view.
  class draft draftC
  class public publicC
  class unlisted unlistedC
  class private privateC
  class withdrawn withdrawnC

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 HealthTech_PatientRecords 和 HealthTech_PatientRecords 的分支。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 HealthTech_PatientRecords处理。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'HealthTech_PatientRecords处理'，对吧？

我们需要加一个处理 HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault 的环节。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault'，对吧？
